config.global.label: General settings
config.global.searchSelector.label: CSS selector for search field

config.global.wordList.label: Search terms (comma-separated)
config.global.wordList.tooltip: List of terms to be shown as animated search suggestions (e.g. screws, nuts, cylinders).
config.global.emptyFocusText.label: Text for empty focused field

config.global.prefixDesktop.label: Prefix for desktop

config.global.breakpointMobile.label: Breakpoint for mobile (px)

config.global.prefixMobile.tooltip: Text displayed before the search suggestions in mobile mode.
